page.title: 03MANHOOD COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The Manhood Community Centre offers a wide scope of courses to the people of Selsey. These evening and weekend courses cover a large number of subjects from Maths and Languages to art, craft and pottery; from car maintenance to gymnastics. There is a thriving Youth Wing where the teenagers of the village can meet, listen to music and mix together generally. This is where they can take part in the Duke of Edinburgh Scheme where they work for bronze, silver and gold awards. The three dramatic groups, Selsey Choral and Musical Productions, who put on the Christmas pantomimes; the Variety Club, who produce "Music Hall" entertainment; and the Operatic Society meet there for rehearsals and productions. The Manhood Showband rehearse in the centre regularly.
